name: Joventure
description:
Made with the Pocket Platformer tool.

Controls Lore

You are a smol kid who wakes up one day in the upper Jovian atmosphere and must win the game in order to get a ticket for a teleporter ride back home to your warm bed on Earth.

You must complete 5 levels of difficult puzzles to survive.

I don't think you can do it.

Disclaimer

The video trailer is not a video trailer. It is a video I want everyone to see. It was made by Melodysheep, who is one of my favorite science communications influencers on YouTube. I personally do not have a YouTube channel because I have been banned for life from YouTube, Vimeo, Facebook, Insta, Twitter, LinkedIn, MySpace... and I could list these forever, but I don't think you have the time. I was banned for being a weirdo. Go figure.

Anyways, I digress.

Enjoy!

Thank you for playing. Comments and ratings have been turned off for your own safety.
